question: Which of the following best explains the relative lack of hydrogen in our atmosphere in spite of its abundance in the Universe: W) most of it is tied up in the water molecule X) most of it is consumed in photosynthesis Y) most of it escaped into space long ago because of its low mass Z) most of it was an unstable isotope that decayed into helium
answer:
Y) MOST OF IT ESCAPED INTO SPACE LONG AGO BECAUSE OF ITS LOW
MASS
